title: New: Shadow Shadow – Riviera
content:
Scandinavia has proved a more than fertile breeding ground for synth-pop artists in recent years, and Shadow Shadow are no exception to that trend.

Almost how I’d imagine The Killers to sound had they grown up in the Northern European haven, Riviera is everything you could want from an indie pop anthem, fantastic male/female vocals, a ludicrously addictive hook and an overwhelming feeling of euphoria. So we’ll never fall in love, but at least we have now.
